title: block number => block reward mapping does not work in authority round
body:
The following mapping in a parity chainspec works for ethash but not for authority round:

```
  "engine":{
    "authorityRound":{
      "params":{
        "blockReward": {
          "0x0": "0x1",
          "0x1": "0x0"
        }
      }
    }
  }
```
